/** * SVGText. *

* FIXME - Add support for transforms. * XXX At least on Mac OS X - Always draw text using TextLayout.getOutline(), * because outline layout does not match with TextLayout.draw() output. * Cache outline to improve performance. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 2.1 2007-05-13 Fixed transformation issues. *
2.0 2007-04-14 Adapted for new AttributeKeys.TRANSFORM support. *
1.0 July 8, 2006 Created. */
